title: wine_Exton_Park_Vineyard_2011_Blanc_de_Blancs_Chardonnay_(England)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 115329.
country: England.
description: Fragrant overtones of acacia honey play alongside lemony notes on the nose, adding a touch of restrained, exotic decadence. A hint of chalk contributes grounding dimension. All combine to make a fragrant nose. These themes play out again on the slender but expressive palate. Pure lemon freshness brightens the notions of honey and chalk, while tiny bubbles provide endless explosions of deep, sustained flavor. This wine seems still young and taut, but the energy suggests great future development. Lemon purity on the finish appeals with its clean and invigorating nature. Drink 2017–2027..
designation: Blanc de Blancs.
points: 94.
price: 50.0.
province: England.

taster_name: Anne Krebiehl MW.
